limitReached.daily: Mwakwanitsa chiwelengero cha patsiku chokumbukira zomwe mwadya.

rating._: Maganizo anu ndiotani pa zimene mwakumana nazo pogwiritsira ntchito webusayitiyi?
rating.title: Maganizo anu ndi otani pazotsatira zakadyedwe?
rating.comment: Mutiuzeko mmene munapangira chiganizo cha kakumbukiridwe ka zakudya zanu

menu.title: Powonera zomwe mwalemba
menu.mealSuggested: Chakudyachi chaperekedwa ndi makina koma simunatsimikize ngati munadya

free-text._: Chakudya ichi sichikugwirizana ndi chakudya chilichonse chimene chili mu makina athu.

encoded-food._: Chakudya ichi chagwirizana ndi chakudya chimene chili mu makina athu.

missing-food._: Chakudya ichi chalembedwe ngati chakudya chosowa mu makina athu.
missing-food.incomplete: Uthenga wosowa wachakudya ichi siwukudziwika pakadali pano.

recipe-builder._: Chakudya ichi chagwirizana ndi chakudya (kaphikidwe ka chakudya) chomwe chili mu makina athu.
recipe-builder.complete: Ndondomeko ya kaphikidwe ka chakudya ichi yaperekedwa.
recipe-builder.incomplete: Ndondomeko yonse yakaphikidwe ka chakudya ichi siyinaperekedwe.
